name: Wireless Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and travelers.

name: Smart Watch Pro
description: Advanced fitness tracking smartwatch with heart rate monitor, GPS, and waterproof design. Compatible with iOS and Android.

name: Leather Laptop Bag
description: Stylish genuine leather laptop bag with multiple compartments. Fits laptops up to 15.6 inches.

name: Mechanical Keyboard RGB
description: Professional mechanical gaming keyboard with customizable RGB lighting and Cherry MX switches.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with precision tracking and long battery life. Perfect for office and gaming.

name: USB-C Hub
description: 7-in-1 USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0 ports, SD card reader, and power delivery support.

name: Portable SSD 1TB
description: Ultra-fast portable SSD with 1TB storage, USB 3.2 Gen 2 interface, and shock-resistant design.

name: Webcam 4K
description: Professional 4K webcam with auto-focus, noise-canceling microphone, and adjustable lighting.

name: Phone Stand Adjustable
description: Universal adjustable phone stand compatible with all smartphones. Perfect for desk or bedside use.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable waterproof Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound and 20-hour battery life.

name: Monitor 27 inch 4K
description: Professional 27-inch 4K monitor with IPS panel, HDR support, and USB-C connectivity.

name: Cable Organizer Set
description: Complete cable management set with clips, sleeves, and ties. Keep your workspace tidy.
